review_text: Great location. Walkable to downtown.
great place very quiet
Nice visit I'll be back for sure
The place was even better than we expected! Awesome time fishing the lake!
very beautiful

Very nice and beautiful place to stay, peaceful and quiet. We were fishing at the lake and enjoying the view. I would highly recommend this place for anyone who is looking for something quiet and relaxing. Thank you so much Bryan!

The neighbor was out side with a flash light after 10pm which was kind of strange to me and I didn’t trust it. A stray dog was running around and I tried to get my son in the house and he called the police.
Great place to stay.
Great experience with host and property.
Second time staying at Bryan's place and we love it! So beautiful and such a hospitable stay

The house and view of the lake were amazing. We very much enjoyed our time there, and wish it could have been longer.
What a gem!
Very nice place. Great view of the lake. Plenty of Deer in the yard every Morning and night. Close to town. Would stay again.

Thank you, Bryan, for the great breakfast with REAL fixings! The table under the covered deck was absolutely wonderful with a great view of the lake and the yard. The deer were an added bonus. Super convenient location and very quiet. Look forward to returning next year.
Was an excellent host and venue. Would recommend to anyone.

Bryan was so kind and provided the perfect peaceful space for my husbands relaxing bday. He even a Ickes the fridge with a few things for my
Husband to make breakfast the next morning. The lake is quiet and just what my husband needed. Thank you!
Loved it here would definitely stay again

This place truly is a gem. It fit 6 adults and we still had plenty of space. It's beautiful and peaceful out by the lake. Plenty of spots on the property to admire the lake. And the deer in the morning! Always a wonderful sight!
The house was awesome! We want to come back over and over again.
A cute cozy split-level that has all you need for hanging on a deck and floating by a dock. A true five-star hang if you're just looking for letting the day drift by on the water, which we were!
Bryan's place was perfect for our weekend graduation celebration. Great communication, easy check-in, and the home was charming with great views of the lake.

Place was great, we enjoyed our stay. Not the owner’s fault, but the kitchen was not clean at all. There were crumbs on the floor in kitchen, the oven was filthy, counters not clean, smelled musty, paper goods not restocked. We would stay again because the location was perfect, golf cart came in handy. We will just buy paper goods and clean like we did this time. Overall, nice place! We loved the back deck and the dock. Also, the two living rooms with TVs were especially nice. Washer and dryer worked great! Thank you for your hospitality!
Great stay. Wish we could stay longer!
This property is a great home away from home. We stay while working nearby and it perfectly located and perfect to relax after working a 19 hr day

Love everything about this house! Excellent location with comfortable living spaces! We enjoyed the boat dock and the back deck for relaxing and spending time together. The house was exactly as described. Bryan is a great host! Thanks for the complimentary breakfast!! We definitely will consider staying here again!!

We enjoyed our short weekend In Milledgeville for GCSU Homecoming. The house is very close to the school and restaurants/grocery. We had plenty of room for 8 adults and feel like we would rent again, especially when it’s warm
enough to enjoy the lake and outdoors!
Great place on the lake for a great price!!
Great communication from Bryan! Perfect weekend getaway and right on the lake.
Beautiful home on the Lake. Overall great place to stay and enjoy the view.

A fishing trip??? This is the place to be!
Our typical guys trips always includes two boats and trucks. This home had perfect parking driveway and boat ramp locations.(very difficult to find)
The home is clean, cozy and comfy. All the deer and nice neighbors are a plus also. Would definitely visit this location again.

Was perfect for a girls weekend away. It was tidy, the kitchen was stocked and everthing was at it was described. The breakfast items left for us was a nice touch as well. We enjoyed sitting on the dock, deck and lawn, and even played a round of cornhole. It was a very relaxing and comfortable place for a weekend away.
Absolutely amazing. Peaceful quiet place to escape.
Bryan’s home is just what we needed for our group for their bass tournament this weekend. Very roomy, clean, and has everything you need!
One of the best vacations we have had. Great location. Easy to use space. Close to a really good Kroger while being away from it all. This spot on the lake is perfect for the family.
Very cozy home in a great location. A+++
Loved the back deck and the view of the lake was beautiful
Beautiful place - will stay here again.

Great Lake house right off of Lake Sinclair. Has a beautiful backyard with a boat dock right on the lake. Great to dock your boat while staying there. The house was very clean and has two family rooms and a beautiful deck overlooking the lake. Bryan was kind enough to even have breakfast items for us. There is also a golf cart that is great for bringing your items back and forth from the dock. Enjoyed our stay!

There was dog hair in the corners and behind the furniture. There was little to no communication by the owners, but things were all in working order and there was no need to be in contact with them. The shade at the dock and the golf cart make this stay.

This was our third summer at this home. The house is close to the marina, centrally located on the lake, and close to restaurants and the grocery store. Easy access to the marina. Golf cart is great to run coolers, towels, back and forth from dock/boat to the house. Layout of the house works well for a large family - kids can be downstairs with their own TV.
Bryan's place was an awesome "home base" for our team while they worked in the area. Bryan was responsive, helpful and a fabulous host. We will definitely be back!
A real gem. Would stay there again. It’s fun driving the golf cart to the dock to watch the gorgeous sunsets.
Definitely would stay again. Great place to relax and unwind. Nice quiet neighborhood.

Bryan and Joanne were fantastic hosts. The home is lovely having everything you’ll need. The view of Lake Sinclair is beautiful, and fishing is always fun. We will 100% stay at their place again if we’re in the area.

WE LOVED IT. I can’t say enough. Due to a real estate issue, our family found ourselves between homes and needed a place to stay for 3 weeks. We made a spur of the moment decision to book the lake house because it wasn’t much more expensive than similarly sized homes in our area of Atlanta. When I tell you that was the best spur of the moment decision I have ever made!! We thoroughly loved our time at the lake house, which truly felt like our home during the time we stayed there. It is very nicely decorated, and I even looked up and purchased a few items from the home for our new house. Looking out on the lake every day was a dream and exactly what our family needed. Also highly recommend renting a boat for a day!

Incredible experience by the lake! This place has it ALL including great views! The owners had thought of everything & we had a great experience. The house was super clean & had so much space for us to spread out. The outside space was awesome too!
Great host! Highly recommended! It is a perfect place for visitors to the area and local families (like ours) in need of extra space for guests!!
Nice and quiet
Great lake house! I was in town for work, so didn't get to enjoy the lake as much as I would have liked, but the house is very well kept and comfortable. I would happily book again.

This is a great location in Milledgeville, very nice lake front house with a large grass area and dock access. The house is nice and kitchen had everything we needed. Beds are comfortable but sofa bed may be best for kids only. We even had some breakfast foods provided which was a nice touch. Overall a great place to stay!
The house was perfect. The view was amazing. The house was clean and exactly as described. The location was excellent and close to everything we needed.

Great place to stay. Good location on the lake. Had a boat dock to keep my boat under. Very peaceful had seating on dock and next to water to enjoy lunch at or just to enjoy the views. Left breakfast for us to cook which was very thoughtful and nice. Had a golf cart to drive to the dock so I didn’t have to carry everything. If your thinking about staying just do it great place to stay to unwind and relax.
Hidden gem is an accurate description

Wonderful house with a beautiful view and great deck! The big flat backyard was awesome for our little ones to play in! The host was very kind and communicated quickly. Would definitely recommend staying here!

This lake house is in a great neighborhood. Has everything you need, including a golf cart to help carry items to and from the lake. It has two large screen televisions. Updated kitchen with cooking ware. Owner even left us breakfast. Would stay here again with out a doubt.
Great place to stay!

This really is a gem. We were visiting family nearby and stayed here with our two small children, and it was perfect. The deck on the back of the house is a great spot to hang out with family. The house had everything we needed for our stay, and Bryan was a great host with excellent communication. We rented a boat for a few days to make the most of the sandy beaches on some islands in the lake, and that was the highlight of our stay. We will be back!

bryan is an excellent host. the property has a great view of the lake with a great dock house which had ample room to dock our two boats. the provided golf cart made getting items from the house to the dock extremely easy and fun. the back deck was covered and spacious with a ceiling fan and lighting. the inside was comfortable and the large dining table was great for our family dinners. plenty of parking in front for our boat trailers and vehicles with a circle driveway. be sure to keep your eyes open for all the deer on lakeview drive. we caught catfish just a short distance from the dock. two of which were about 8 lbs. the kids enjoyed catching the little bream at the dock also and there were fishing poles and a tackle box provided if you didn't have any.. we had such an amazing time.
Everything was outstanding

We had a great time at this hidden gem! My husband really enjoyed his time fishing at the lake. We really like the fact that a golf cart was provided for transportation for the land because those were step hills. I would recommend this place to all my friends.

Wonderful home. This is our second year staying here. Location is perfect, close to the marina and to the grocery store, restaurants. Beautiful waterfront. Easy docking for our rental boat, in a cove but right off of big water access. Kitchen is well stocked with essentials. Nice covered deck for outdoor dining. Very clean. Easy check in.

This lake house is great! This was actually our second time staying here and it was even better than before, we will be back and I highly recommend it. Bryan’s place is clean and has everything you need. We loved eating our meals on the covered back porch overlooking the water and taking the golf cart to the dock and covered pavilion. The steps into the lake make it a perfect spot for kids to swim. My niece had a blast! We cooked several meals and found everything we needed in the updated kitchen. It’s a great space And the location is excellent!

Our stay here was just great! Plenty of indoor space, lovely outdoor seating + dock and great amenities! Bryan provided breakfast materials which is the nicest touch I’ve ever had at an Airbnb stay...one less thing we have to worry about + spend money on while traveling! He was very quick to respond to any of my messages as well. Would recommend staying here to anyone and we can hopefully visit again one day!

This was such a great spot for our family! It was good weather and we ate on the deck for nearly every meal- and snacks on the dock were so fun!
Games and kid friendly rooms meant parents could relax, and the property made it easy to enjoy the weather.
Kitchen is well- equipped (really, the entire house!) and the hosts really think through all the things you could need for a relaxing lake trip! We had answers to our one question within a few minutes of asking it- wonderful home and wonderful hosts!

Well worth the money. This place is a gem. The neighborhood was gorgeous. It met every need for our group to visit and be comfortable. It is clean with spacious well appointed rooms. The deck offered a wonderful eating area with option to grill along with great views. The dock was easily accessible for me with bad knees as they provided a golf cart, "Sinclair ".
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Krogers and antique shops were minutes away. If you want a quiet, safe place right on the lake this is for you.

Our stay was awesome! Bryan was very responsive to our questions before and during our stay. He was so thoughtful to leave us breakfast items, kitchen items (spices, coffee maker, oil), golf cart to use on the property, extra fish rods. The entire family enjoyed the whole week-fishing (we came home with 100 lbs of catfish and caught a few blue gill off the dock), boating, and relaxing by the lake. Thanks Bryan!
This place exceeded expectations!
Great place with great Lake access. Very clean and well maintained. You won’t be disappointed.

Great and quiet setting right in the lake. Covered deck was a real treat. Kitchen had everything we needed. Owner was very informative and left great check-in/check-out instructions. Would definitely stay here again.

House was spotless and nicely set up. We spent most of our time out on the back porch enjoying the calm and the view. They were also awesome enough to have breakfast items in the fridge for us upon arrival which was amazing as we got in at almost midnight. Highly recommend this place
Bryan had everything that we needed for our stay. The breakfast he left was very thoughtful. Comfortable beds! Outside was amazing also. I'll stay there again.
Great roomy place. Excellent amenities and a beautiful deck view to look out at the lake each morning. Would definitely rebook if in the area again. Host was quick to respond to messages.
Great house. Everything is there for you. I would highly recommend.
A weekend my sister's and I will never forget. We plan on booking again. Great location. Great view. Peaceful!
This was our 2nd stay at this location and we’ll be back. It’s a perfect location for us, close to family. Great host! Excellent communication! Super value!
The house is in a good place but just would like for the host to have better communication

The place was beautiful, we loved just sitting in the back near the lake in the mornings to start the day. If we get to come back we’ll be sure to try and find this place again. So worth it for a place that just lets you disconnect from everything else if you wanted to.

Beautiful property with all needed amenities. Did not get to go by the lake as it was unseasonably cold. But the view was spectacular. I was able to enjoy the peace and quiet, and see cardinals and blue jays playing by the patio, as well as ducks milling about. Accessible to many food options and grocery store, while remaining secluded. I would love to go back in the spring/summer and use the lake and sit outside.
Truly enjoyed our stay. The location was great and the cleanliness was outstanding! It was very beautiful.
Very comfortable home, in a lovely neighborhood, with beautiful views... need I say more. Thank you for sharing your lake house.

My two daughters and I took a “weekend getaway trip” and booked this hidden gem. My daughter is a student at GCSU and we wanted a place that would be convenient for all of us to stay. This house had everything that we needed for a relaxing weekend away: board games, a fireplace, deer to watch, fishing from the dock , and of course the gorgeous lake. We especially enjoyed being so close to grocery stores and downtown Milledgeville without feeling like we were smack dab in the middle of town with all of the students. Bryan was so helpful and provided us with all of the information and things that we needed for our stay as well as some helpful tips about the property.
We enjoyed the location so much that we are currently looking for our own hidden gem nearby! I would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a relaxing weekend away or even a staycation!

We love, love, love this home and the property is gorgeous! The house was immaculate and very comfortable. After driving for three days from California, the breakfast food and coffee left for us was heavenly! Driving our 4 yr. old granddaughter around in Sinclair was a blast! We will have precious memories with her playing frisbee and skipping oysters on the water and watching the deer. We truly did not want to leave! This was a great find and we will be back.
Great, safe neighborhood. House was clean, well kept, and had an amazing view out back! We had a great stay.

This house is well put together and space is maximized for comfort. We booked for 3 days but we were so comfortable and relaxed we added an additional day. This is a perfect house for a quick weekend getaway... We will definitely be back!

The homeowner seems like a good guy. No huge issues and the house is nice. The best part to me was the deck on the back of the house, where we could sit and whatch the deer come out in the evenings. Would be great for a small family or group with 2 kids ( one bedroom has 2 twin beds in it).
Booked this house for a proposal on the dock. Book a boat at Lake Sinclair marina and it’s a short ride over. Dock is nice and pavilion area. Easy check in. Clean. Very good deal.

This is the second time we have stayed. New owners are wonderful, and respond quickly! Love love the new patio, the steps added to the dock, and the golf cart was a huge help. These were all new things added since we’ve stayed in February!
We really enjoy this location and the access to the lake. We would use Bryan's place again in the future.

My wife and I really enjoyed our time during our stay here. Check in was easy. We loved the dock - we relaxed, fished with the provided poles, and swam in the lake. The golf cart was a game changer to get down to the lake. We spent almost all of our time on the deck playing board games and eating our meals. We will definitely be back!
Fabulous place! Covered deck attached to the house and covered dock with seating area by the lake made for an enjoyable outdoor evening even though it was raining. Would definitely stay again!

We had a terrific stay here; I can highly recommend it. The home has an amazing view of the Lake with lots of beautiful frontage. We spent hours near and in the water, and our dog had the best time of his life. Bryan is incredibly easy to communicate with, providing everything we needed at just the right time. And the nice touches in the house were over and above expectations. Everything was so clean and tidy, it was easy to feel at hoe. With easy access to the quaint downtown and area attractions, we could easily split our day between lake activities, hiking, and sightseeing. This property truly is a gem--one we found hard to leave and one we would definitely rent again whenever we return to the area.
I loved staying here! Great space, beautiful view, quiet & secluded!

When I first arrived at the house, I could not stop saying “wow”. This house was amazing, and coupled with our excellent hosts, me and my friends had an incredible stay in Milledgeville. The house itself was charming and had everything you could possibly want - and the dock was the perfect spot where you could spend hours every day and have so much fun. It was great!

My girls and I truly enjoyed Bryan’s Lakehouse, I wish we could have stayed longer. The house was clean, check-in was smooth, and be even put some breakfast items in the refrigerator for us :)
I had a issue trying to hook the living room tv up to the WiFi, it wouldn’t connect but the tv in the den worked just fine. We really enjoyed the deck and the dock, wish we could have stayed longer. This was really a nice and relaxing weekend away from home.
Great location and wonderful stay with the family. Bryan was a great host and even had stocked the refrigerator with breakfast items to kick start our vacation.
The owners are great to work with and were quick to respond to any of my questions. The house and property are well cared for and the house was very clean. It was a great place to get away and relax!

Great location on the lake. Close to Sinclair Marina for boat rental. House is well laid out for a family, spacious with two living/tv areas and full full baths. Kitchen is equipped with essentials, including fridge with ice maker and water in the door. Golf cart is a nice added touch for shuttling floats back and forth to the dock. Laundry room was handy for drying wet towels. If I came back I would bring a ramp for my pups. They could get in the water but not out at the sea wall, so we had to lift them out. Lake Sinclair is a beautiful lake, water is clean. Plenty of eating out options nearby.
Great hidden spot to spend some quality time enjoying the lake.
Had a great experience renting Bryan’s Airbnb!
Bryan has been very accommodating to my guys who are from out of town working in milledgeville!! Thank you!!!

We traveled to the Lake-house to celebrate Mothers Day weekend while sheltering in place with family. We wasn’t sure how it was gong to work out with the short planning but to our surprise it was such an awesome experience.
The Lake House embodied the name a “Gem”. The location was perfect, with the grocery store close by. Sinclair Lake was most enjoyed by the family.
We found a new hobby of fishing. Bryan made the trip even more pleasant with quick responses.
Wonderful house with amazing views!
Very nice place. Great location as it’s only 5 min from town. Nice Dock and plenty of room to dock boats.
We enjoyed our stay at this hidden gem!

We had a fantastic time at the Hidden Gem lake house. We appreciated all the quick responses from Bryan and for him being willing to let us stay an additional night! The house had everything we needed and more. It is decorated well and we felt super comfortable. We loved cooking on the charcoal grill and eating on the back porch every night. They had all the pots and pans we needed, olive oil, coffee, and things like that we may have needed. At the dock there were 2 Adirondack chairs and 2 additional ones on the covered picnic area that can be used for sitting at the dock. We brought our own beach towels. There is a rocky area by the sea wall that the dogs used to get in and out of the water. Walmart and Kroger are very close by and we were able to get extra things that we may have needed. One day we went to Jere-Shai off of Milledgeville road and rented a jet ski for 2 hours, which was a great experience. We had a fantastic time and will definitely stay here again!
Great lake house. Big yard for kids to play. Awesome lake area with lighted covered area at the lake.

This place is nothing but amazing! The location, the view, amenities I can go on and on. The host is super helpful. There so much space and it cozy and comfy to make you feel at home! The breakfast was definitely a plus!!

I enjoyed staying in this place. It was very comfortable and cozy! Very clean! Easy check in/out. Wish there were a few more pots and pans there. Great stay! Will stay there again when I’m in the area again.

We visited for Georgia College's graduation weekend. The place was easy to find, clean, and well-located for our plans. Parker was an excellent host. I was surprised that the house was attached to another property, but this did not present any problems. I was nervous about parking, but overflow parking was very close to the house. Check-in instructions were clear and easy! Check-out instructions were easy and fast. I would certainly stay here again.
Wonderful home and location as well as a great host, Parker! Would want to stay here again should we find ourselves in this area again!
It was home away from home. I would defiantly recommend, and will be booking for my next visit.
We will be staying here again. Clean, comfortable, very pretty. I just wish it had a king sized bed! Literally my only suggestion
Parker's place was very clean. This was just our speed. A very quiet neighborhood and easy to find. We had a great time!
Clean and comfortable. Had everything we needed. I would definitely stay here again. Good communication and instructions
Immaculate newer home with updated amenities
Great host and place! Absolutely no complaints at all!

This place is SUPER cute, secluded, and quiet, which is exactly what we were looking to rent. Tracy is precious and was really good with communicating with us. We will definitely be back. Thank you Tracy for your kindness!
Great stay! Highly recommend!!
This was the cutest little treehouse, a perfect place to stay when visiting Milledgeville.
We adored this little tree house! It was perfect for our staycation! Tracy was so kind, and beyond helpful! 10/10 would recommend!

This was the perfect spot for my husband and I while enjoying our 6th anniversary. Didn't have very chart Very clean and adorable! Had practical items. The mattress slept great!!! Really enjoyed the little fire place and the matching robes. No complaints from here.
Tracy was very friendly and down to earth. I
My wife and I really enjoyed staying here for a couple of nights! It was just right for a couple's getaway. Would highly recommend!

I had a lovely time with my partner at Tracy’s studio cabin! The cabin was clean and spacious, and we loved the gas fireplace. It kept us nice and cozy in the freezing temperatures. The shower had hot water, the kitchen was clean, and there were plenty of towels-pillows-blankets. Great little amenities as well around the cabin like a Keurig with pods for coffee and hot chocolate, and a well equipped kitchen. Shampoos and such.
The area is quiet, woodsy, and a very short drive from downtown Milledgeville which is just lovely with its historic architecture and numerous little restaurants.
Most of all, we enjoyed listening to all the songbirds in the mornings!

I was looking for a last minute getaway and Tracy’s place was perfect! So peaceful and calm. I was having trouble starting a fire outside and her husband and son were quick to come help. Excellent communication and cozy space. I didn’t want to leave! I will definitely be back!

It was my birthday getaway weekend with my hubby - we had such a peaceful time - we burned out the outdoor fire pit - I cooked and enjoyed the silence of nature. We had breakfast at a local restaurant. Tracy and her husband were so kind! I truly recommend the TreeHouse at Tracy .
Awesome place to recharge energy and be peaceful. 100% recommended.
Great listing! Tracy was a great host, always kept in communication. The place was very cozy & unique. Enjoyed my stay! Will recommend to others!
Stay was amazing and exceeded expectations truly my favorite Air BNB so far will definitely be back
Tracy and Ty made us feel so welcome, surprising us with fresh Krispy Kreme donuts was the sign that kind and humble people still exist and it made our trip! We will definitely be back 🥰
The treehouse was just as described! Tracy was an awesome host with great communication and even recommended local spots in the area. I'm definitely looking forward to my next stay!
perfect for us

We loved staying at the treehouse! It was close to downtown but far enough out to feel secluded. The indoor and outdoor gas fireplaces were so cozy and we enjoyed the kitchen ammenities that made everything so convenient. Tracy and her husband were so kind for the brief time we spoke. Also, downtown Millidgeville is a great place for food options and to get a drink. I HIGHLY recommend the breakfast burrito from Bollywood Tacos! 🌮

Beautiful airbnb!! Tracey was very helpful and very interested in her customers stay.
This airbnb made you feel right at home and was a very quiet peaceful stay! Definitely recommend booking with her❤️
I’d go back for sure. Awesome place, awesome host!
Super cozy and welcoming!

One of the nicer places I’ve visited in Georgia. Extremely peaceful for an awesome price. Tracy was a great host and we couldn’t have asked for better hospitality. We will 100% stay here again when passing through!
When in Milledgeville… it’s a great place to stay
Loved staying at Tracy’s place. We found it so peaceful for a little getaway and the town was nice and quiet. Will definitely be coming back again!

This was my first time staying in a treehouse and the experience was absolutely amazing. It was COZY and I felt right at home while being away from home. When I visit GA again I definitely will be staying here. I highly recommend if you’re visiting the area!!

Tracy has by far been the best host we have had with AirBnb. Our stay was just as amazing as before! She is extremely helpful and always makes sure to stay in touch before, during, and after your stay. This place is all around perfect, and we hope to go back again!
Guest from the previous night wanted to stay another night so she upgraded me to the tiny house and I absolutely loved it!!! Gorgeous!

The Tree House was exactly what airbnb’s are supposed to be. Conveniently located with all the amenities and more! Nice homy touches like a record player with albums. Games to play during downtime or bad weather.
A quiet neighborhood with lots of wildlife to hear and see from the back deck and a responsive, friendly host that went out of the way to provide useful information for the guests no matter what the purpose of the visit.
We will be visiting this town again and praying The Tree House will be available.
It was a nice place out in the woodsy area, host was communicative and gave plenty recommendations.
It is difficult to show how spacious and cleverly designed this space is, pictures do not do it justice. Tracy is a great host with a unique and fun property!
We had a great stay! Such a cute spot!

Everything was just as it was advertised! We were very pleased with our stay at the treehouse! Tracy was so helpful and generous to be sure our stay was worth every penny! The treehouse was beautiful and adequately advertised! Thank you!
Beautiful space, clean and secluded
We enjoyed our stay, very nice location and was super thankful the host was so helpful and that the doorways and bathroom are wheelchair accessible.

It’s was very beautiful peaceful private she was very responsive and you wake up with the woods around I love it’s private and quiet and it’s not to far from Milledgeville or Macon and also not far from lake Sinclair
Very nice and clean place. I booked this place the same day as check in and Tracy was on top of things and made sure that my boyfriend and I had everything we needed.
This was a very private and peaceful stay. The squirrels playing on the roof was the only commotion. The bed was very comfortable & the place was extremely neat and clean.
Second time we’ve stayed at one of Tracy’s AirBnBs and it was such an awesome getaway as it was so peaceful and clean!

Beautiful little Airbnb. I was in town spur of the moment and could not find hotel vacancy. Found this gem on BNB at 11 at night. Host responded right away and bam. I had a place to sleep that was so so clean and comfortable. A tad pricey but I get it. I would have rather spent the money and had this place versus staying at a bedbug-infested roach motel. Will definitely book this place again.
My Wife and I had a great time. Nice place to get away and look forward to doing it again.

For what we were looking to get and wanted this place was absolutely perfect. I could not have ask for a better stay. It was the best get-a-way weekend I have had in months. This will definitely be on our "to stay" list for as long as it is available.
The cutest cabin. Was super relaxing for me and my husband. We loved the outdoor space and warm fireplace. Recommend for sure
Our stay was magnificent. As I read through the views before our visit, someone suggested a different sofa, and sure enough, there was a couple friendly sofa. Everything else was as advertised.

We were in the area for a grandparent's event at a local school and looking for an overnight stay. I was looking for an alternative to a hotel room and this was actually a better value. The treehouse was so inviting and self contained. Everything we needed was provided.
We would -and have- recommended this stay to everyone we talk to.

Perfect little spot in the woods! It was really cold when I visited but I was toasty with the little gas fireplace and a super comfy robe. Everything you need to have a quiet get away. I bet it's absolutely beautiful in the spring! I would not mind living there :) Check in was a breeze, host was very responsive. Will stay again if I'm in the area.
Great first Airbnb experience! Cozy, compact, with enough to do. Awesome experience for couples on a getaway
Great place to stay! Will book again in the future!!!

The treehouse was everything we wanted it to be and more! The interior was clean and welcoming. Perfect space for two and conveniently located to amazing restaurants. Would definitely recommend/book again.
Tracy and Jeff are the absolute best and very accommodating!
It was a really nice stay. A great view a great cabin and a great time. Very quite hardly no traffic on the road that goes by it.
Everything was perfect from the moment we reserved the tree house till we left. The accommodations are gorgeous and clean with all the comforts of home. We will be back.
Beautiful, cozy and quiet! This is a wonderful place!
The house is such a perfect spot for a quick and quiet getaway! Tracy was great at communicating with us during our stay.

Perfect little cabin for a weekend get away! Super clean and secluded, making it perfect to disconnect… and connect with each other. The stove top outside was definitely our favorite part of the whole thing.
Very clean, easy check in, excellent communication, and just a very nice place to stay. Will definitely stay again!
Really enjoyed the stay and the host was awesome!!!
Wonderful place to stay. I’ll be staying again in the future.

Tracy was a great host and helpful. After I mixed up dates and talking to her i decided to keep my reservation. Glad i did. The place was super clean and just as described. It was a quiet little get away. Just want was needed and will definitely be returning for longer.

we loved our stay! it was so hard to leave. the treehouse was so cozy and welcoming. we loved pretty much everything about the tree house. we would definitely recommend this to anyone coming to visit the area. the hosts included so many details that made our stay that much more incredible.

Perfect house for my daughter and I to visit GCSU. Close to the college and downtown so it was just minutes to the restaurants. House was bigger than we thought with great tall ceilings. Clear instructions with a helpful notebook. Uncluttered and clean so we could relax.

Host was responsive. A couple of things that stand out, the $150 cleaning fee to me was a little excessive due to all that is required at checkout, and taking a shower was difficult due to the extremely low water pressure.
Nicely renovated house in an excellent location
The hosts were great with great communication
We lived are stay in Milledgeville walkable to downtown. Clean and fully stocked kitchen.

Convenient location, just half a mile from restaurants and GCSU. The house was very clean and well furnished. It is an older house, so electrical outlets are limited. There were none in the bathrooms. Overall, it is a good place to stay for a short visit in Milledgeville.
Such a cute little house! They had snack for us and everything. ❤️
We enjoyed our stay at Macey’s and would recommend their house to friends and family. The house was clean, it was in walking distance to local restaurants and it is in a quiet neighborhood.
What a wonderful stay! Beautiful spacious home and nicely decorated.

Had a great stay! Traveled with older family members and they truly enjoyed the home with its old school charm. Macey was super easy to work with and we will definitely be back! Easy access to downtown and colleges!

I scheduled this vacation rental for guests of ours from Savannah. Although the weather was not agreeable, the home was very cozy for their stay. This is a great home for anyone looking to stay in downtown Milledgeville!!
We will be staying here again! Great location, close to a grocery store, close to great restaurants, spacious, clean, comfortable beds. A total win
Beautiful home! Check in was extremely easy and everything was very clean.
Beautiful house!

This house fit our needs perfectly for this trip.
It’s a lovely, historic little home in a nice quiet, safe, section of town. The property was clean, had everything we needed and was worth the price. Would definitely stay with Macey again.

Perfect place to stay for the weekend while visiting family! The house is so cute and super clean and makes you feel right at home. I would definitely recommend to others and will be a returning guest myself!
Beautiful, clean house that had the space and everything we needed! Would definitely recommend!

We came for GSCU family day. This home was a few blocks from downtown which allowed us to walk everywhere. The home was perfect to share with another couple and much better than staying at a hotel. Thank you for hosting us Macey!
The home was so beautiful and cozy. Will definitely be back!!
Great location - close to GCSU and downtown. Space was really neat - restored cottage much prettier and larger than we thought!
Great place to stay in Milledgeville. Will definitely stay again when in town!
So cute! Words can’t describe it! Very clean & spacious. Just what I needed, if it had been available another night I would have stayed again
I really enjoyed this beautiful home. Walking distance to downtown. I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

This is a cute and charming bungalow! Macey was super friendly and responsive to my inquiries and questions. House was very clean and nicely equipped. Plenty of towels and kitchen well stocked. There are pros and cons regarding the location. Pros: it’s only a short 5 -7 min walk into downtown and GCSU campus - a straight shot down the street. Great for campus tours and being close to downtown shops and restaurants. Cons: the road noise from the highway is very loud. Consider this if you are a light sleeper - traffic goes into the evening hours and starts early in the AM. While the listing does state it’s on the corner of a main road and to expect some noise, it was more than I had imagined.
Clean & comfortable. Walking distance to GMC and downtown.
Macey was friendly and accommodating! The house is beautiful and spacious. It is older and has so much charm. It was very clean. My family would happily stay again!
Beautiful home! Loved the modern updates and true to 1930s design.

Our family was in town for a funeral and this stay was perfect for us. Macey was very responsive and ensured we had all we needed to check in and check out. The front porch was a great spot for morning coffee! The pictures capture the space well, but it was much larger than we had anticipated. Great space! We look forward to staying here next time we are in milledgeville.
We had a great time! The house was very cute, spacious, and clean!

The house was actually larger than we anticipated, which was a plus. Only 3 nlocks from the downtown area made it convenient to walk to restaurants. We appreciated the charm of this nearly 100 year old house and that much of the hardware was still original.
Great to see there is finally something in downtown milledgeville. We will definitely be back!

We enjoyed our stay. We came in town for work and this place suited all of our needs. It was such a beautiful place with the best bedding I have found in any air b&b. I highly recommend staying here if you find yourself in Milledgeville.
The house is as described and very clean. It has all the basics to make a stay simple. Will stay again.

A gem in Milledgeville! Stay here!!! This house is amazing! Right in the heart of downtown Milledgeville! Walkable to everything downtown has to offer as well as the college campus! We stayed for a girl’s weekend away and had a blast! Enjoyed cocktails Al fresco on the sprawling covered front porch. The kitchen is well-stocked and the host has thought of the best little touches to make this feel like a true oasis. You can also easily come visit your friends on Lake Sinclair and make this your home base. Would absolutely rent again!
We were there to tour the historic town and this location put us in walking distance to everything.
What a beautiful old home! We had plenty of room and everything we needed for our stay. Just a couple of blocks from downtown and GCSU.
The house is beautiful and cozy but spacious. I really enjoyed the front porch. Our host was super helpful
Very spacious and clean. Within walking distance to downtown Milledgeville. Kitchen was well stocked and host left a nice little snack basket. Would stay here again.

This place is just as pictured! A cute quaint spot in downtown Milly. It was beautifully decorated. The porch was a great place to hang out and chat. Macey was such a great host that helped answer any and all questions! You can easily walk to the adorable downtown to grab food and drink and you can also walk the oconee greenway! Best of both worlds. We will definitely stay here again.
The house was so cute. The dock was wonderful. It was so peaceful and tranquil there. Totally enjoyed our stay.

Stephanie and David's lake home was the perfect spot for our weekend getaway! The home was very clean and kitchen had everything we needed to prep for dinner. Our kids loved the stand up paddle boards and we really enjoyed the beautiful views from the pier. Thanks for hosting us!

This was the perfect location for our family! Loved being able to grill out and enjoy the beautiful lake scenery from their dock. Perfect location and close to Milledgeville. Used the paddle boards too - so fun!

This place is exactly what they say it and it is a very nice place to bring your family for vacation. I really like that there is a boat ramp the next bend up and you do not have to get on the main lake to get your boat from the boat ramp to the house dock. Will definitely be staying here again.

My family and I really enjoyed our stay at Stephanie and David’s lake house. We had a couple of issues connecting with the Wi-Fi but when I reached out the hosts were very responsive and offered suggestions to get all of our devices working properly. We spent the majority of our time outside on their fabulous deck. We love to fish and I must say that out of all the Air BnB rentals we have had at lake houses (this was the third), this was the absolute best fishing spot. We caught crappie, and catfish and the catches were plentiful. We kept 21 of the 25+ that we caught. The largest two catfish were 14+ and 16+ pounds. We definitely would love to come back in the future. Thank you so much for opening your home for guests to experience your lovely place.
Unbelievably nice place. Everything down to the neighbors is a five star. I wish i would have had my family with me.
The place was great. Easy access to lake wonderful boathouse. Fishing was spectacular. Take a dip net. Close to town no hill to brave to waters edge. Highly recommend. 1en stars if I could.

We loved our stay! The home is more spacious than the pictures, and very comfortably furnished. We had plenty of room for two adults and four teens. The kitchen is very well supplied with ample pots and pans, silverware, cooking utensils and appliances. The home is close to other homes but because of the shoreline it feels so secluded and private. The dock, where you will want to spend most of your time, does not disappoint! Plenty of toys, deep water to swim, life jackets for everyone including small kids and large adults like me. You feel like you’re in the middle of nowhere, but it’s an easy drive to grocery stores and restaurants. We will be back!

This was our second time in two month staying at this home so obviously we like the place. Our son is a student and nearby Georgia Military College and it's a perfect place for us to stay when we visit. Dave and Stephanie are great host and very responsive to any questions we had. The home is exactly as advertised, spotlessly clean, and easy to check in an check out.
If you're looking for a place to relax and get away from everything with a beautiful view this is a perfect place for you. We especially love the covered dock/boat house on the lake. Overall its a great place to stay with nice and very responsive hosts

This is one of my favorite lake houses that I’ve rented on Lake Sinclair. It’s in a quiet area on the lake with a gorgeous new deck and all the amenities you need for a lake weekend. We loved the outdoor tv, and all the comfy chairs out there. The view from the back porch and the dock are perfect for watching the sunset.

We had a great stay at David and Stephanie’s lake home. We loved having paddle boards to cruise around the lake. Just 10 minutes from good restaurants in Milledgeville. The home is very peaceful and promotes relaxation.
Had a awesome time. Fishing was good. Very peaceful. Dock was amazing. Definetly will consider it next vacation.

I kid you not : this is one of the most scenic and tranquil experience i have had in my life. Lake is beyond beautiful . House is clean& well stocked with a pin to an anchor (pun intended). Good vibrations in every aspect. Hosts paid attention to details and are just wonderful humans .Hope to visit again soon.

My family and I had a great long weekend at Stephanie and David's lakefront cottage. It was exactly as advertised and looks exactly like the pictures. We struggled a little to get in which was mostly our fault, and Dave was very responsive and was quick to reply and got us right in.
The cottage was spotless and exactly as advertised. The best part of our stay was the beautiful brand new covered dock and the kayaks and paddle boards. The covered dock and fan were perfect in the summer heat and made for a couple of quiet, relaxing days on the water. Our two teenage boys loved the kayaks and paddle boards and the deep water dock was great for them to dive off of and swim. We also really liked the layout of the cottage - it had a nice open living area/kitchen and a huge table to eat/play games, and the bedrooms were separated and made it easy for people to sleep/get away from the group if they wanted to.
David and Stephanie were great hosts and we'll definitely be back

Great place to stay the grand daughters loved the paddle boards and we loved the kayaks. the view from dining to the lake I really enjoyed. You could sit and have something to eat or just enjoy the view of the lake. Everything was very easy to use and put away. would love to visit again

Excellent place to stay!!!! We enjoyed it so much everything you need is there the view is amazing the dock is so nice and the swimming is perfect for your family . Hopefully Stephanie and David will continue to share their home so my family can visit again

The dock and swim area was great. It was very hot so the covered area and ceiling fan were wonderful. We enjoyed the kayaks and paddle boards also. The ladder on the dock was the best I’ve seen, very sturdy! We had our wake boat with us and really appreciated the cleats to tie it up. The house was very clean and stayed very cool.
Awesome place. Fabulous dock and view

despite the few hiccups we had during our stay, david and stephanie were amazing hosts. they were always more than willing to help us and make sure our stay was the very best. we really enjoyed being able to sit out on the dock in the evening and watch the sunset. truly cannot say enough wonderful things about the two of them as hosts!
The setting was so beautiful and serene. Sunset was fabulous.
Great view!

My family and I really enjoyed this beautiful place. Coffee on the dock was amazing. Made new memories fishing with my son and teaching my grandson how to cook a steak on the grill. Was allowed a late check out which gave us time to enjoy breakfast together and have a few more laughs. The host were available at all times and great to work with. Will definitely be back. You will love this place. Plenty of room but cozy and inviting.
What an awesome experience! We loved the house and the location. It was really peaceful and we would love to stay there again and bring our boat!

We came to visit our daughter at school for the weekend and staying here was a great decision. I’m not sure why anyone would stay at a hotel when this is available 10 minutes from downtown Milledgeville. It was great having a cup of coffee on the dock to start the day. Very peaceful. Communication was quick and check-in was a breeze. We will definitely be back!

Lake house is perfect for someone who enjoys the great outdoors. The property is very well maintained and easy to access from land or water. The covered dock is a great place to drink a hot cup of coffee in the morning and a nice cocktail in the evening watching the sunset.
Had a wonderful time. Great location
Great stay. My family and I found the place to be very peaceful. The property has everything you may need.

The dock is absolutely amazing. Such a wonderful place to enjoy the lake and so close to nearby Milledgeville. The hosts are easy to work with, very responsive and were very kind about a last minute request to extend our stay due to an emergency. Highly recommend for a relaxing lake getaway!
Loved our stay. The dock was amazing. Had everything we needed.

An excellent location and excellent hosts! This home has everything you need for a short or long term stay and the water views/access were such a bonus! A great home and location - highly recommended!
Beautiful location, perfect for our needs. We were able to come and go when we needed, but still feel like we had a remote vacation. We will definitely come back for another visit!
Beautiful home with a brand new dock. Very peaceful. Super clean. This place has everything you need. We really enjoyed ourselves. Thank You

Nice place to relax with lots of natural views in a quiet area. Also, loved how close it was located to downtown Milledgeville. Stephanie and David are very responsive owners to problems if they arise.
Great location....
Beautiful views! Adorable and very clean house.

My Airsoft team, The Yankee Division, stayed for a couple nights while at a local event and it was simply delightful. All the guys could not stop commenting on how relaxing and comfortable it was. If we’re ever back in the area we’d love to stay again AND stay longer

The lake house was nice and very convenient and comfortable for our family! Beautiful views of the lake and quiet, secluded location but still convenient to town!
Place was very nice and quiet we had a great time staying at Stephanie and David place from October 7-10.

So far one of my most favorite air B&B! A stunning view and a beautiful home. Everything was great. The hosts are very attentive and respond quickly when needed. My only regret is I didn’t stay longer!

This is an excellent choice for a peaceful stay at the lake. Our family stayed here for 4 days to celebrate a birthday. Quiet lake area. We had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Great place to unplug!

Perfect place to get away for the weekend clean and very pretty

Revel was super friendly…we felt right at home.
Beautiful historic home and very friendly hosts!
Revel and Matt are delightful. Their home is absolutely lovely and the air bnb space is perfect for a weekend stay.
Prices comparable with local hotels without all the other people and noise. Room was gorgeous and hosts were great. Shower is a little tight for larger people but overall wonderful stay.

This is the second time I've stayed at Revel's place, and it was just as peaceful and beautiful as the last time. Great value for the price, she and her husband are super friendly. The apartment is lovely, full of historic charm. The location is quiet and feels private, despite being only a short drive away from downtown. I would gladly stay again!

An architecturally original house! Loved staying in what felt like a separate house, but still connected. However, the best part of the stay was Revel, herself. She is a generous soul and a wonderful hostess. I'll be back!

Loved our stay at Revel's place. It's in a beautiful spot, and the room itself was so inviting and cozy. Revel shared with us the history of the home and her enthusiasm and hard work in restoring it shone through. We will most definitely stay here again.
Charming historic home in a private setting. Revel was a wonderful host and we look forward to our next visit

The stay was even better than anticipated! Every aspect of the stay was exceeded our expectations. Revel communicated with us about everything and made our quick stay perfect. We wish we had more to do in Milledgeville so that we could have stayed longer. I definitely recommend this adorable location to any Be looking for a place to stay while visiting Milledgeville.
Superb historic stay. Great location and proximity to Milledgeville but also feels incredibly rural. First class.
Wonderful stay in a historic home.
Awesome stay! The room was very unique and just beautiful. Lots of history! I would definitely recommend the stay.

Revel and Matt were wonderful hosts. Very welcoming and friendly. Their place is absolutely adorable with lots of historic charm. Clean, quiet, and close to the heart of Millidgville, it was everything we hoped for and more to make our trip great!
Comfortable and cozy. Lots of good books to read and a large smart tv with streaming services. Thanks for making us feel welcomed!
Revel and her husband were a delight. I could go on and on but I’m grateful that AirBnB brought me to them. I would love to stay there again on a future trip to Milledgeville.

Revel was a fantastic hostess! Very warm, personable and responsive. Staying in her beautiful antebellum home was like stepping back in time- very cool! Beautiful gardening beds with blooming flowers show Revel's attention to beautiful details that made this a special setting for a quick "get away". Staying in this beautiful home was a real treat. The porch was relaxing and the bed was super, super comfy. Matt and Revel were kind and gracious hosts and we appreciated their hospitality. We loved their dogs too! The room was clean and wonderfully decorated.

Revel and Matt were such great hosts. They immediately welcomed us. We love history and historic homes, so this was perfect. Our stay, our accommodations, and our hosts more than exceeded our expectations. Next time we visit Milledgeville, we would love to stay here again.
Beautiful historic home on a private wooded piece of property. The owner was helpful at check in and gave us great recommendations for dinner. Will return if we are in Milledgeville again.

I've enjoyed staying in some wonderful historic manor houses, castles, villas and homes, but Revel's historic farm house ranks at the top of the list. This beautiful home does not fit the "farm house" perception... it's far more elegant in it's own casual way; the rooms are tastefully decorated and appointed; the grounds are beautiful and serene... and George, Bella and Flynn (the 3 resident Labs) are sweet and entertaining. If the house and setting aren't enough, Revel and Matt are gracious, accomodating hosts that make the stay worthwhile just to meet them. This is a wonderful place to stay while you visit the beautiful old homes in Milledgeville.
Thank you for dealing with me and helping me with all the preparation I had to do for a fishing tournament. Y’all are great hosts with beautiful property!
I instantly felt at home in this place, and we come back not to mention a beautiful sleep.
Revel was a wonderful host. We really enjoyed our stay. A great place for varieties Georgia history buffs.

Highly recommend!

Beautiful room. Very clean. Very comfortable. Will definitely stay again and recommend to other people.

The hosts are very friendly and the grounds offer wonderful opportunities for strolls, sitting and meditating, birdwatching and star gazing. We did not watch much television but they do have internet TV available. The coffee maker is a nice start to the day. Milledgeville has so much history, so many neat things to see and do, and a large grocery store nearby offers everything you might want for a carefree stay. Restaurants are conveniently nearby. We saw deer nearby and kept hoping they would show up in the yard! Landscaping was very nice and we felt so comfortable we would not change a thing!
Perfect place to stay and so close to Andalusia
Very quaint and comfortable. Revel is wonderful!

Nice clean place to stay. Will definitely stay here again!

What a wonderful experience. Revel was such a gracious host and her home was beautiful.

I got to get my furbaby fix by playing catch with their labs. The bed was super comfortable, the room temp was perfect, and she even had snacks and drinks for us....most importantly coffee. I got to sit on the porch and drink coffee in a rocking chair, can't ask for a better setting.
Revel recommended a restaurant at the country club and it was delicious.
If you're in the area, don't hesitate to stay with Revel. It was the perfect place and they were perfect hosts.

The ceiling is palatially high, yet the room is thoroughly warmed on a cold night because the wing has its own heat pump. The spacious room is unusually well decorated with antiques, appropriate, handsome and sturdy.

Revel was great - there was bad weather in the area and the power went out before we arrived. She let us know and kept us updated. Fortunately the power came back on before we arrived. Beautiful, large space. Very comfortable bed. We appreciated the snacks, drinks, and coffee. Really unique historic Airbnb - we loved it!
Very clean and pretty
Great place Revel and Matt are the best host and supper friendly

Great stay! This Airbnb was so charming and one we will certainly stay in on future trips to Milledgeville. It was easy to find, well equipped with the usual necessities, and a super comfy bed! Revel is a very nice and welcoming host!!
Great private space. Easy check-in and quick access to the lake, Milledgeville, or campus.
This was our 3rd visit to this beautiful home - it is so lovely and serene. The host is the best and so friendly & helpful with anything you may need - we give it 10 stars !

This is a beautiful historic home with tons of character. Revel and Matt were great. They provided everything we might have needed. Check in was easy and convenient. There is a 1700’s hand hewn cabin on the property that is super cool. The land is beautifully landscaped with gardens, flowers, and trees. It was convenient to downtown. Snacks and drinks were in the room, in addition to the coffeemaker. The home has a ton of history that the owners are eager to share.
Enjoyed our stay, super welcoming place!
Wonderful stay, so peaceful and close to everything....but you felt miles away from town!

This place is amazing on its own. It’s quiet and peaceful and so beautiful. It’s obviously a historic house, and Revel has done an amazing job keeping it up. This entire experience was AMAZING! Thank you Revel!!
Never disappoints!
Best hosts and you will feel like you are home.
Greatest hosts!!
My go-to place to stay when in Milledgeville. Safety, convenient and hospitality over the top!
This place is a true hidden gem!
Revel and Matt are great hosts and have the perfect set up. A rare gem!

Revel and Matt greeted us when we arrived and showed us around. They both have true southern hospitality and made us feel right at home. The accommodations are totally private with its own ac unit, it is connected to the main house by porch only. We loved all the antiques and history of the house. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

If you want a quick room to stay the night in, or a great place to stay for a week long getaway, this is the place for you. Comfortable, clean, spacious and the hosts were so amazing. They were sociable and kind, but also very respectful to us. Great stay, we will definitely visit again!

Revel was a wonderful hostess. The room has a comfortable bed, a bathroom, microwave and a mini refrigerator. It was very clean and it had its own entrance. This place is nestled in and very private but yet close to the main highway. Loved it!! You won’t be disappointed!!
The house is a delight! Comfortable, clean, and welcoming...all close to town. We love staying there!

A lovely large room in wonderfully restored historic home. You have a private entrance directly into the room which has a fantastic king bed, desk and extra seating. Must stay!! Great space and location. Kind and friendly experience and very clean.
This was a perfect little place for a quick night away.

This place was amazing not only because of its historical significance but also because the hosts created a warm and welcoming environment. The location is easy to get to and in close proximity to local attractions. We definitely want to visit and stay at this wonderful gem again.

If you want generous, warm, southern hospitality and stay in an amazing historic home (1835) with all the requisite amenities, then Revel and Matt’s home might be your perfect choice.
I could write numerous paragraphs about our wonderful, extensive visit here in Milledgeville, Georgia, but I will delimit to a couple. We could not have picked a better place to stay while we evacuated from Savannah and Hurricane Dorian. Our hosts completely took care of us in so many ways. They gave us day travel tips, restaurant suggestions and special attractions to see in a fifty mile radius.

Most importantly, our host were loving, charming, humorous and respectful of our privacy. We will be back.

What an amazing little place!!! The hosts were very pleasant and kind. They gave us the utmost privacy. A great, cozy room with everything you may need! Revel was very accommodating and friendly.

Very good, comfortable, quiet and very clean place. Revel is the ultimate host.

We highly recommend Revel's airbnb! Great place and host.

Revel has a really special place that has been treated with care and detail. If history, well chosen furniture pieces, and cute pups are your thing then you need to stay here!
